item.title: ‘Reality speaks for itself’: This narrative about Ukraine is collapsing
item.description: Russia boasts of gains, but its army is trading lives for villages with no strategic value.

item.title: ‘The weirdest Democrat in America’
item.description: There’s no one in politics quite like the Democratic governor of Colorado, Jared Polis. He's a serial entrepreneur who cashed in on the dot-com boom and has pushed back on over-regulation of artificial intelligence and the tech industry. He’s in favor of abortion rights, but was against overregulation of mask mandates. He's pro-business and pro-weed. The “pro-liberty” governor joins host Megan McArdle to discuss Trump’s tariff and immigration policies, transgender care and how to make housing and health care more affordable.

item.title: The law that is trapping America in the past
item.description: NEPA’s review process delays desperately needed infrastructure projects for years.
